title: Average ticket price Chicago Blackhawks ( NHL ) 2014/15
yAxis: Average ticket price in U.S. dollars
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Average ticket price in U.S. dollars, with a total of 10 data points. The chart has 5 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely positive which exists from 2014/15 to 2010/11.
In a similar manner, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 2007/08 to 2005/06.
Also, the next significant trend is moderately neutral which exists from 2010/11 to 2009/10.
Also, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 2009/10 to 2008/09.
Similarly, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2008/09 to 2007/08.
gold: This graph depicts the average ticket price of Chicago Blackhawks games within the National Hockey League from 2005/06 to 2014/15 In the 2005/06 season , the average ticket price was 34.88 U.S. dollars . The Blackhawks play their home games at the United Center .
